  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Deprecated. 
    use @see BatchCleanupServiceImpl with own trigger outside of batch context.

    @Deprecated
public class SpringBatchDatabaseCleanUpTasklet
extends Object
implements org.springframework.batch.core.step.tasklet.Tasklet
    Removes old job instances and executions from the Spring Batch database tables. SpringBatchDatabaseCleanUpTasklet.
